mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, t.level, t.create_time FROM sens_rbac_role t, sens_rbac_user_role_ref r WHERE r.user_id = #{value} AND t.id = r.role_id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref WHERE user_id = #{value} AND del_flag = 0
mapper.select: SELECT count( * ) FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref r, sens_user t WHERE r.role_id = #{value} AND r.user_id = t.id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0

SELECT t.id, t.role, t.description, count( * ) AS count FROM sens_rbac_user_role_ref r, sens_rbac_role t WHERE t.id = r.role_id AND t.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.role_id order by t.level ASC
